us.aaronweiss.juicebot

Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.aaronweiss.juicebot.Bot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoBot, DataAwareBot, MessageBot, SimpleBot

    public abstract class Bot
extends Object
implements Client
    The core of all juicebot bots, handling all necessary internals.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Aaron Weiss
